item.description:
Usher in 2010 in supremely tall style at The Resolution Ball (hosted by BEG - Boston Event Guide), at The Skywalk Observatory level of Top of the Hub, up on high on the 51st floor of the Prudential Center, in Boston's Back Bay.

Several of our members have attended prior BEG events (Resolution Ball in 2007, Back Bay Gala in 2008) and their events ROCK! So a bunch of us have already bought tickets and are keen for as many people as possible to join us for this awesome party:

*** NOTE: This event is open to all adults of any age ***
*** Only entrance requirement is that you be at least 21 years old on 12/31 and keen to party!! ***

Your night to remember starts with a cocktail reception and a scrumptious reception with passed hors d'oeuvres and food stations.

Then, slide over to the dance floor as the live band, The Love Dogs, and a DJ help you dance the night away with swing, Motown, Soul, R & B, 70s, 80s, 90s and current top-40 dance hits.

As the clock strikes 12, ring in the new year with tons of party favors with a 360˚ view of Boston and watch the firework displays.


All-Inclusive Event Package (8pm - 2am) includes:
Scrumptious reception with passed hors d'oeuvres and food stations from 8-10pm.
Entry into the Skywalk Observatory festivities.
Premium bar, dancing, midnight countdown, cash bar, and party favors.


PRICE: $139 as at 12/20 - prices are going up DAILY!
Use Coupon Code NYEVIP to get an extra $10 discount off the prevailing prices -> $129 ticket price (without goody bag).
Recession-beating alternative: Volunteer at the event for 2-3.5 hours and donate $20 (tax-deductible) to The Ellie Fund. Go to Volunteering @ The Resolution Ball for more info and to sign up.

**** Buy your ticket ASAP - prices are going up DAILY ****

**** The longer you wait to buy your ticket, the higher the price will be ****
**** Full price for this event will be as high as $175 this year ****
**** So if you want a good deal, do not delay buying your ticket!! ****

You need to buy your own ticket directly from Boston Event Guide at:
http://www.bostoneven...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet up @ 7.30pm in the bar @ The Sheraton (attached to The Pru)
item.name: New Year's Eve Party: Resolution Ball - Back Bay
